creator: chip@force-elite.com
text:
While the documentation for ServerName could be made more clear to better handle
this, some users still think they can use 'ServerName *.example.com' and get
things to work.

We should thow a configuration error in this case, instead of silently going
forward, and maybe suggest they use a ServerAlias with a glob instead.

creator: rahul.g.nair@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 22023
simple minded patch to flag error if ServerName contains glob chars

e.g
|./bin/apachectl start
Syntax error on line 106 of /space/store/apache.26.May/install/conf/httpd.conf:
Invalid ServerName "*.india.sun.com" use ServerAlias to set multiple server names.

creator: covener@gmail.com
text: Thanks Rahul, committed with style tweaks in r1042098.
